message.content:
Write a tsconfig.json file at /Users/imorgado/Documents/agent-girl/chat-236abf1c/splice-v3/tsconfig.json

Requirements:
- Strict mode enabled
- Target ES2020 for UXP compatibility
- Module: ESNext
- ModuleResolution: bundler
- Enable decorators for Lit
- Path aliases: @ -> src, @components, @hooks, @utils, @types, @context, @config
- Include src/**/* and tests/**/*
- Exclude node_modules, dist
- Enable sourceMap

Write a minimal, modern config. No explanations needed.

content.text: I'll read the project structure first to understand the setup, then write the tsconfig.json file.

content.content: EISDIR: illegal operation on a directory, read

file.content:
{
  "name": "splice-v3",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI services integration",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:all": "npm run test && npm run test:e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css}\"",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "uxp:watch": "uxp plugin watch dist",
    "uxp:load": "uxp plugin load dist/manifest.json",
    "uxp:reload": "uxp plugin reload",
    "uxp:debug": "uxp plugin debug",
    "uxp:package": "uxp plugin package",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "adobe",
    "uxp",
    "premiere-pro",
    "plugin",
    "spectrum",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "dependencies": {
    "@spectrum-web-components/theme": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/menu": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/action-button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/icons-workflow": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/picker": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/textfield": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/checkbox": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/dialog": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/toast": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/progress-circle": "^0.42.0",
    "lit": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@adobe/cc-ext-uxp-types": "^1.0.1",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.49.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.18.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.18.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^2.1.8",
    "@vitest/ui": "^2.1.8",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "globals": "^15.14.0",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.11",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2",
    "vite": "^6.0.5",
    "vitest": "^2.1.8"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ],
    "*.{json,md,css}": [
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0"
  }
}

content.text: Now I'll write the tsconfig.json with the specified requirements:

input.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["ES2020", "DOM", "DOM.Iterable"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["src/*"],
      "@components/*": ["src/components/*"],
      "@hooks/*": ["src/hooks/*"],
      "@utils/*": ["src/utils/*"],
      "@types/*": ["src/types/*"],
      "@context/*": ["src/context/*"],
      "@config/*": ["src/config/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*", "tests/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}

file.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["ES2020", "DOM", "DOM.Iterable"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "sourceMap": true,
    "declaration": true,
    "declarationMap": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["src/*"],
      "@components/*": ["src/components/*"],
      "@hooks/*": ["src/hooks/*"],
      "@utils/*": ["src/utils/*"],
      "@types/*": ["src/types/*"],
      "@context/*": ["src/context/*"],
      "@config/*": ["src/config/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*", "tests/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}

content.text:
Done. tsconfig.json created at `/Users/imorgado/Documents/agent-girl/chat-236abf1c/splice-v3/tsconfig.json`

Config includes:
- Strict mode enabled
- ES2020 target (UXP compatible)
- ESNext module with bundler resolution
- experimentalDecorators for Lit
- Path aliases for all requested directories
- sourceMap enabled
- include/exclude for src and tests
- Declaration files generated for library consumption
